content.prompt: Based on morphological characteristics, the phylogenetic tree above has been developed for species I, II, III, and IV. DNA sequencing has recently been completed for a particular gene found in all four species. The sequencing will provide additional information for answering which of the following questions?

choices.label: Is species I the common ancestor of species II and III?
Does species I contain the greatest number of vestigial structures?
Are species III and IV the most closely related?
Should the positions of species III and IV be reversed?

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
